email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the vessel's specifications and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is fair given the current market. The vessel is in excellent condition, and I can provide the full specs upon request. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Please send over the full vessel specs and the charter party agreement for review. Also, confirm the laycan dates again to ensure there are no overlaps. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.00 works for you. I’ve attached the vessel specs and the draft charter party agreement for your review. The laycan remains October 15-20. Let me know if you need any further details or adjustments. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on our end. We’ll proceed with the agreement as discussed. Please confirm the final freight rate of $51.00 per metric ton and the laycan dates. We’ll arrange for the necessary documentation on our side. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed—freight rate is $51.00 per metric ton, and the laycan is October 15-20. I’ll send over the finalized charter party agreement shortly. Looking forward to a smooth shipment. Best, Sarah
